# gmt

Call a GMT module. This function is not called directly by the users, except when using the $monolithic$ mode. Usage:

```
gmt("module_name `options`", args...)
```



```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
using GMT
GMT.doc_source_links("gmt")
```
